remarks:
A property related to substitution that unlike ~ equs5 doesn't require a distinctor antecedent.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2007.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 15-Jan-2018.) 

---

 A property related to substitution that unlike ~ equs5 doesn't require a distinctor antecedent.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2007.)  (Revised by NM, 3-Feb-2015.)
statement: equs5e $p |- ( E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) -> A. x ( x = y -> E. y ph ) ) $.
